alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 12:31AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 100 AM MST... At 1231 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Maricopa, or 12 miles west of Casa Grande, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Maricopa, Stanfield and Ak-Chin Village. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 159 and 164. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 161 and 174. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pinal County; West Pinal County
